page.title: 01General Review of area.
page.content: Our area is one of rolling hills overlooking a wide river valley.The hills are cut by deep wooded dingles with streams flowing down to the{River {Wye. There are only two small villages, {Llowes and Ffynnon Gynydd. It is predominantly a farming area. The only heavy industry is that of a constructional engineer who builds barns and repairs farm machinery. The River Wye provides recreation for many.Local outward bound schools use it for canoeing.There is an annual raft race.The fishing rights are privately owned.The Wye is noted for its Spring salmon. It is an area of great beauty with panoramic views of the Black Mountains and the Brecon Beacons. The{Maesllwch Estate}owns a large percentage of our area.
